title: Yasuo wind wall bug

embed.description: Riot WTF Where is my Windslash???????????????/

body: AS shown in the video, the yasuo windwall was behind me, I windslash forward to yasuo. My windslash somehow didn't come out.

replies.body: You were still inside the Windwall's hitbox, so when you used R, the projectile spawned inside of your character model, which in turn meant it was instantly destroyed.
unfortunately that ain't a bug. it's got a box as a hitbox, instead of a flat line.
